name: PONGALICIOUS 2
description:
This is the Sequel of my first Game PONGALICIOUS! 

Here in PONGALICIOUS 2 I reworked the whole Design System, added in New Game Modes, and reworked the AI with different Difficultys to always keep the game Interesting and Challenging!

It currently contains 2 different Game Modes: 

- The Normal Game Mode 

- The Obstacle Mode - with different Obstacles on the Table!

It contains 3 Difficultys aswell - (Easy,Medium,Hard)

I would appeciate any kind of Feedback! In the future there will be many little Updates on the Game, adding more Game Modes and adding new Tables to the game!

The beautiful Artwork you can see in the Background is done by:

Artwork created by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)

https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment
